listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.0-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: The Debian Wheezy update 7.8 has been integrated. It fixes several security issues in addition to the errata security issues already issued:
libyaml-libyaml-perl (2014-9130) (37113)
The Linux kernel has been updated to 3.16.7-ckt2. It provides many bugfixes and fixes several vulnerabilities (36969).
The file system check now ignores clock skew problems, which previously required manual user interaction (36233).
The object class msGPOContainer has been extended to support the new attribute msNTSecurityDescriptor (36979).
The univentionUserTemplate object class has been adapted to include all attributes from the person, organizationalPerson and inetOrgPerson standard LDAP schemas (35775).
Fix the shutdown of Univention Directory Listener if a failed.ldif file exists (37291).

The configuration of the UCS DNS name server BIND9 was prone to open resolver attacks, which are used to launch Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks against other hosts of the internet. To prevent such abuse the default configuration will be changed to allow 'recursive queries' only from IP addresses of the private address ranges, link-local address ranges, localhost and local networks. If the name servers need to be queried from any other hosts outside those network, they must be configured using the &ucsUCRV; dns/allow/query/cache. This change gets only applied for newly installed domain controllers. See 1298 for additional details (37553).

The UMC requires JavaScript. If it is disabled in the web browser, a warning message is displayed. The styling of the notification has been improved (36338). Also, display a warning if an Internet Explorer version earlier than version 9 is used (it mis-renders SVG graphics) (36914)
Added an arrow to the UMC grids that indicates which column is used for sorting (36357).
Several buttons are now properly aligned to corresponding input fields (36291).
The Favorites category button now fades in and out, depending on whether favorite modules are chosen or not (36787).
A exception was logged in the JavaScript console if the grid was resized and if notifications were hidden. This has been removed (36645).
Fixed a bug which prevented that UMC components could write into their logfiles (37317).
The icon on the policy reference button is now shown (36291).
The LocationMatch directive of Apache is now only configured for the UMC (37518).
Don't let Firefox ask for resending POST form data when logging out of UMC (36445).
Fix an endless login animation if the login fails due to a stopped UMC server (36636).
Fix the error message which is shown if no network connection is possible on client side (36680).
Fix the visibility of error messages when a login dialogue is opened (36400).
The notification while changing objects which are part of an Active Directory domain has been placed in a more visible area (36732).
The error message if the connection to the LDAP server fails has been extended (35719).

The get_exception_method() has been removed. Error information are now provided by the UDM base exception itself (35273, 30088). Exceptions are not re-raised anymore as this hides important error information in traceback feedback reports (32979).
It is now prevented that a search with a given attribute name can raise a bad search filter exception (28383).
An error message is now shown when trying to operate on non-existing objects (34246).

Searching for an invalid object type will not raise an exception anymore. Opening a non-existent object (e.g. object was moved / deleted) now shows an error message instead of raising an exception (35350).
Error handling has been improved in case a UDM module could not be identified (34680).
Inform about automatically set default values when opening a object (36700).
Error handling of UDM modules has been improved by adding default methods which contain information about the current edited object type (34985).
Unnecessary scrollbars have been removed from the UCS installer software selection (37730).
Fix an error regarding the error handling of closed UMC module process sockets (37036).
The JavaScript method umc.tools.umcpProgressSubCommand did not send the UMCP flavour along with a request and could therefore fail due to insufficient permissions (36875).
Fix error if the UMC server and the UMC module try to close the module process at the same time (35231).
Fix a server crash caused by corrupted translation files (36658).
The UMCP command udm/layout failed if a DN was given which could not be identified as a UDM object (29231).
Allows UMC modules to set the response status when the module initialization fails. This is required to show the login dialogue after a password change (34353).
The query of the LDAP DN of the user logging into the UMC has been fixed. Previously users without a POSIX account were not found (37178).
Fixed the handling of crashed UMC module processes (37367).
Add the UMCP flavour to error information when a traceback occurs (37169).
Connections to the LDAP server weren't closed after the session timeout. This caused a UMC server crash due to max open file limits (37453).
Mask passwords when logging changed properties at debug level 4 (36591).
Enhance the look of various error messages (36291).
Fixed error handling when renaming the currently logged in user (35280).
Additional exceptions during the creation of UDM objects are now handled (20044).
Ask for closing the detail page if changes to the object have been done (30088).
If the details of a package are opened which is not longer available (e.g. the repository has been removed), an error occurred. This has been fixed (37403).
The translation file for installed apps modules may have been corrupted during a release update. This has been fixed (37571).
Extended one command to allow searching for multiple components at once (needed for updater module) (37364).
The checkbox Use unmaintained repositories is now placed above the Apply changes button (36457).
After trying to install a software component in the repository settings module a white page occurred which prevented installation (36868).
The Firefox address bar is now always hidden (35583).
If the DNS lookup of the &ucsMaster; fails during a UCS domain join, a warning message is now displayed (34238).
When joining into an Active Directory domain, log messages from the Active Directory join were not logged (37049).
The default keyboard layout for German has been corrected (36936).
The branding of the appliance wizard can now be customised via the &ucsUCR; variables umc/web/appliance/name and umc/web/appliance/logo (37488).
The wizard failed if the system had more than four physical network devices. This has been fixed (37001, 36884).
The wizard now shows information about how to reach the system and UMC after the configuration process (36938).
In text mode or after aborting the configuration, a message is shown to the user how the UMC can be accessed after reboot (36968).
The DNS error message when selecting a system role is now prompted as an alert dialogue (36940).
The DNS domain check when selecting a system role has been adjusted to correctly determine an UCS domain (36440).
If the UCS system has not been configured yet, a corresponding message is shown during login at console/via SSH asking the user to use the UMC to complete configuration. (36971).
Some text field descriptions have been adapted (36723).
Only system setup scripts belonging to the current module are now executed when changing settings via the modules for changing certificate, language and network settings (36939).
A DHCP lease may be now requested in the UCS setup wizard via unmarking and remarking the DHCP checkbox on the network page (36665).
The syntax check for the LDAP base has been adjusted to be more specific (36334).
The search for system locales has been adjusted such that wildcards are implicitly used (29922).
The configuration of keyboard model and keyboard variant has been corrected (37105).
It is now possible to prevent domain joining. The profile variable start/join was previously not evaluated (36701).
Reset join credentials if they are incorrect (36876).
The DHCP query in the Network settings dialogue has been fixed (35851).
The package removal in appliance mode has been corrected (36874).
Fix the configuration of primary devices and bond-miimon in bonding network devices (36340, 36342).
The gateway input field is not required anymore. This allows to set up systems without connection to the internet (36586).
Fix base system deployment if no domainname is specified (36873).
Users without the POSIX option are now able to change their password in the &ucsUMC; (31828).
Fixed setting of the user expiry date if a user account is disabled (36330).
Fixed the removal of the account expiry date of a user (25279).
A PNG file can now be specified as user photo. It will be internally converted into JPEG (36273).

The user properties CtxBrokenSession, CtxReconnectSession and CtxRASDialin now have default values. They prevented changes via UMC when not having sufficient LDAP permission to change these attributes (29884, 37592).
Fixed a problem which prevented the creation of reports in some circumstances (36234).
Automatic IP assignment for a network will now show an error message if there is no more IP available to use instead of a traceback (33527).
Setting the attribute DNS time to an empty value does not trigger an error anymore (33256).
Internal "hidden" users are now ignored in the license check (37654).
The Free for personal use edition license has been extended to 50 users and 50 clients. Existing license keys need to be updated, please see 1295 for details (37448).
Added a plugin which checks the package status (35861).
Fixed the timeout value for pinging the gateway. It blocked the diagnosis if the gateway was not reachable (37032).
List all App Center apps (or other components) blocking a release update (37364). The message shown has been improved (37363).
The dialogue showing the list of packages to be updated/installed is now limited in its maximum height (36291).
Adapted the link to the new errata overview page (33539).
Open the Software update module upon UMC startup during release updates and show a information dialogue about the current update process (37357).
The hints and warning messages before or during the execution of a UCS update have been clarified (37360).
In some situations the software upgrade didn't show any update progress. This has been fixed (37564).
The Release policy has been renamed into Automatic updates and its property descriptions have been improved (33190).
It is now possible to change the password of a user after setting an empty password length in the referenced password policy (8429).

The Samba share option force printername was activated implicitly during modifications of existing print shares. Now it only gets activated on new print shares and if the UCR variable samba/force_printername is not set to no or false (37123).
Close the progress bar for server shutdown if no permission exists to shutdown the server (36992).
After changing the own password a login dialogue is shown if a LDAP connection needs to be re-established (34353).
Remove references to the network object when deleting it (35099).

section.title: &ucsUDM; command line interface and related tools

listitem.simpara: Added support for the following operators in a UDM filter: <, <, <=, >=. (36970).
When executing a maintenance or release policy, a requested reboot is now only performed once all updates have been performed (37231).
Detect broken HTTP proxies like DansGuardian, which block downloading the Packages files and updater scripts while still signalling success (37345).
Old Samba TDB files are now handled in the pre-update script (37534).
The update scripts have been adjusted to UCS 4.0-1 (37661).
The Scalix schema check have been removed from the pre-update script (37145).
It is now possible again to search for UCS systems (35700).
Translations of some error messages have been fixed (35700).
The connection to the PostgreSQL server is re-established in case of an error (35700).
When using univention-upgrade all components blocking an update are now displayed (37349).
The available Univention App Center apps can now be queried on the command line by running univention-add-app with the parameter --list (37153).
A new script univention-install-joinscript has been added. It can be used when developing packages for UCS that ship with a join script (32525).
Fix a segmentation fault in univention-debug when reopening the logfile (37317).
An obsolete cron job (/etc/cron.daily/amavisd-new) has been removed (36928).

The new &ucsUCRV; variable mail/antispam/headertag can be used to define a string to prepend to subject header field for SPAM messages. If the variable is unset (default), the subject is not modified (36664).
The AMaViS service was always listed as stopped in the System services module of the &ucsUMC;. This has been fixed (36998).
The permissions for the pykotadmin.conf &ucsUCR; template have been fixed (36859).

Prior to the generation of the CA, the system time is updated. A timeout of 15 seconds has been added to the use of rdate to query the current time from a NTP time server, as this sometimes stalls endlessly (36934, 36935, 36937).
Fix error during parsing of univention-system-info output (36923).
Fix the domain where archive uploads are sent to (31192).
Improve error handling (33092).
Fix uploading of archive for specific dmidecode versions (37384).
This update disables the insecure SSL protocol v3. It is possible to override this by setting the &ucsUCRV; apache2/ssl/v3 to true before or after the update (36232).
The startup mode of the MySQL database can now be configured via the &ucsUCRV; mysql/autostart (13811).
The new &ucsUCRV; mail/saslauthd/cache/timeout (default 1800) has been added to define the saslauthd expiration time of the authentication cache (in seconds) (36949).
If no connection to the UVMM daemon is possible, an error message is now displayed instead of a traceback (33963).
Fix loading the kernel module bridge during initial installation (37215).
The timeout for the libvirtd liveness check has been raised to 30 seconds (if the &ucsUCRV; libvirt/check/timeout hadn't been modified locally (36605).
Add a time stamp to the output of the libvirt-check.sh script output (35069).
Temporary files for noVNC token files are now created on the same partition to fix a problem with cross-device renaming (36988). Also, fix the noVNC links for VMs running on localhost (36105).
Display a HTTPS link for the first public and private IP of cloud instances (36905).
Add tooltips displaying the security group and key pair in the instance wizard (36906).
Fix header button of the cloud connection wizard to close only wizard and not the full module (36585).
Add a progress bar while waiting for modifications of the state of a virtual instance (36380).
Update the information of running cloud instances more often after adding, changing the state or deleting an instance (37301).
Handle failure to stop UVMMd during update more gracefully (36927).
Add a time stamp to the UVMMd check script output (37040) and log the complete output (34352).
Ignore errors reading UVMM profiles (34542).
The SharePoint document search showed no results due to failing group membership check This has been fixed (37233).
Quick successions of restarting Samba through init script restart could leave behind a single unresponsive samba process. This has been fixed (37343).

The default for the Samba print server architecture was 32 bits. Now on newly installed systems the print server architecture is determined by the host architecture. Additionally the smb.conf parameter spoolss: architecture can be adjusted manually by setting the new &ucsUCRV; samba/spoolss/architecture (see man smb.conf). On updated systems this UCR variable is maintained to keep the old default (34068, 37476).
A potential issue during the in-place migration from Samba 3 to Samba 4 has been fixed (36395).
Several spelling mistakes have been fixed (35199).
LDAP base DNs with uppercase letters caused synchronization rejects. This has been fixed (33110).

GPO Security Descriptors can now be synchronized between OpenLDAP and the Samba directory service. By default this is not activated, an upcoming errata update for UCS@school 4.0 will make use of this feature (36980).
Ignore cn=Subschema and warn if Univention Directory Listener didn't pass a entryUUID (36981).
Check that the join account is member of the Domain Admins group in Active Directory (35562, 37168).
Don't fail if dynamic DNS update are disabled in the Active Directory domain (35870).
Handle renames of the Administrator account in Active Directory (36776) and in UCS (36778).
Support direct unconditional clock synchronization with the Active Directory server (37481, 36406).
LDAP base DNs with uppercase letters caused synchronization rejects. This has been fixed (37450).
The following packages have been added to the maintained package repository (36467, 36735, 36609, 37669, 37288, 36583):

This update silences the PHP cron job, which is cleaning up old PHP session files. Due to a mis-configuration from previous upgrades it was sending emails containing error messages every 30 minutes. This has been fixed (36621).
Timestamps were added to store the start and end times of individual join scripts in join.log (36290).
A traceback in ucslint module 0001 has been fixed. This traceback could appear if there were problems while reading the join scripts of the source package (37688).
